scripts.stop: for i in $(lsof -nT -i4TCP:8081 | grep node | awk '{print $2}' | uniq); do kill $i; done
scripts.android: export VISUAL=idea; react-native run-android && react-native log-android
scripts.ios: export VISUAL=idea; react-native run-ios && react-native log-ios
scripts.server-bg: yarn run server & sleep 12 && adb reverse tcp:8081 tcp:8081
scripts.log-android: export VISUAL=idea; yarn run server-bg && react-native log-android
scripts.log-android-device: adb logcat -v time | grep --color=never ReactNativeJS | sed -r 's|./ReactNativeJS\([0-9]+\):\s||'
scripts.build-run-android: export VISUAL=idea; yarn run build-android && yarn run install-android && yarn run log-android
scripts.cleanup: rm -rf android/build android/app/build .buckd/tmp android/.gradle; rm -rf ios/build; yarn cache clean; watchman watch-del-all; watchman watch-del $(pwd); cd android && ./gradlew clean;
scripts.promote: bash -c 'if [[ "$0" != "bash" ]]; then eval "$(echo code-push promote BeStimulated-$0 Staging Production --mandatory --noDuplicateReleaseError -t `jq ".version_$0" < package.json`)"; else echo Usage: npm run promote "<platform>"; fi'
scripts.promote-all: npm -s run promote ios; npm -s run promote android
scripts.ota-all: npm -s run ota android; npm -s run ota ios
